comment:
*

XPathFunction provides access to XPath functions.

* *

Functions are identified by QName and arity in XPath.

* * @author Norman Walsh * @author Jeff Suttor * @version $Revision: 446598 $, $Date: 2006-09-15 05:55:40 -0700 (Fri, 15 Sep 2006) $ * @since 1.5

methods.name: public Object evaluate(List args) throws XPathFunctionException
methods.comment:
*

Evaluate the function with the specified arguments.

* *

To the greatest extent possible, side-effects should be avoided in the * definition of extension functions. The implementation evaluating an * XPath expression is under no obligation to call extension functions in * any particular order or any particular number of times.

* * @param args The arguments, null is a valid value. * * @return The result of evaluating the XPath function as an Object. * * @throws XPathFunctionException If args cannot be evaluated with this XPath function.

methodNames: public Object evaluate(List args) throws XPathFunctionException
